HOME.HERO_TITLE: Create your Dockerfile in just a few clicks
HOME.HERO_SUBTITLE:
Professional Dockerfile generator with an intuitive graphical interface.
Configure your Docker containers without writing a single line of code.
HOME.FEATURES_DESC: A complete suite of tools to create, configure, and deploy your Docker containers
HOME.FEATURE_1_DESC: Create your Dockerfile with a modern and user-friendly graphical interface
HOME.FEATURE_2_DESC: See your Dockerfile generated in real time as you configure
HOME.FEATURE_3_DESC: Easily manage security, networks, volumes, and users
HOME.FEATURE_4_DESC: Export your configuration or share it with your team
HOME.CTA_READY_TITLE: Ready to create your first Dockerfile?
HOME.CTA_READY_DESC: Start with our guided assistant and generate your Docker configuration in minutes.

BASE_IMAGE.SUBTITLE: Select the Docker image to serve as the foundation for your container
